bibl.title: A.S. Hunt and 'Youtie's Law'.
bibl.note: La règle définie par: Reinhold MERKELBACH, Lex Youtie, ZPE 38 (1980) p. 294 (iuxta lacunam ne mutaveris), se lit déjà sous la plume d'A.S. HUNT, CR 27 (1913) p. 167: "To assume errors on the part of the scribe when it is quite uncertain what the scribe actually wrote is hardly ever justifiable".
GONIS Nikolaos, A.S. Hunt and 'Youtie's Law'.
